lenders.name: B & B
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization. For such small amounts, we can help people make a living or realize a dream.

lenders.name: HomeAway Cottages
lenders.loan_because:
THE  KIVA TORCH

When asked if we could lend a hand
          To others with a need
   The choice to help the Kiva way
            Became a gift indeed

But soon we'd learn the greater gift
           Was given unto "we"
From all who sought their funding needs
         Yet asked for nothing free

For each a story filled with hope
     Our chance to change a life
A small amount to reach one's dream
        To rise above their strife

The gift we send that holds the flame
          Which lights prosperity
  To one in need who soon returns
       The brightened flame to "we"

And basking in its' warmth and glow
      Now others changed for good
 Their joy, their pride, their gift to us
        This Torch for greater good

And on we hope to pass this Torch
          Again and yet again
    To all who pass within its’ light
       A gift we’ll each retain

       Roger Van Wie, Kiva Lender
        For "We - The Friends of Avenida"
                             2010
lenders.occupational_info:
Stock Options Trader
Vacation Rentals

lenders.name: William Griggs
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info:
William Griggs is an interactive consultant and entrepreneur from Nashville, Tennessee. He is a graduate of Emory & Henry College and Brentwood Academy preparatory school.

Over the past 4 years, William has worked with CentreSource, Spheris, Inc., the Tennessee Bun Company,  My College Road Trip and Suineg Consulting.

Currently, William is in the process of starting giveyear, a social enterprise he is incubating in the Nashville Entrepreneur Center that seeks to change the world by harnessing the talents of our nation's most promising future leaders and providing them with an opportunity to serve.

In addition to his interactive work, William is a dog lover, avid reader, and a dreamer

lenders.name: Gabriela

lenders.name: OnTimeAirFilters.com
lenders.loan_because:
As a startup, we value the entrepreneurial spirit and understand how starting one's own business can be a dream-come-true.  Kiva's loan recipients demonstrate that spirit and work hard to develop sustainable businesses that will support themselves, their families and their communities.  We understand the hardships that new businesses face and want to help give these entrepreneurs in developing countries the chance to achieve their dreams.  

As successful entrepreneurs, we feel it is our obligation and privilege to give back to those who are just getting started.  We believe that successful business started with Kiva micro-financing go on to create successful communities with a higher quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: We offer a subscription service for air conditioner and furnace filters.  Our goal is to make keeping your HVAC units in tip-top condition, without ever having to think about it!

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I want people to realize what they are capable of given the chance.

lenders.loan_because: To help support others and help them to achvieve their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I teach a 9th grade Global Issues class. This lending group  is composed of students wanting to make a difference

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I know the importance of getting a little bit of support when it's most needed.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: it's one small way I can try to make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: New York Land Man
lenders.loan_because:
We want to help entrepreneurs help improve their own lives without being limited by access to capital. Through kiva, we hope to bypass the endemic corruption and wasteful administration costs of aid programs and efficiently assist the working poor to become successful.

We encourage kiva donors to check the portfolio yields of the field partners. There are plenty of field partners with 20% and under portfolio yields.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people who are motivated to take care of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I was in real estate sales for eleven years.  Now I take care of my home and my family.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.occupation: After school Teacher in Beverly Hills

lenders.name: Chess
lenders.loan_because: I reap emotional, social and financial rewards when I do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I've spent 10+ years managing the production of books, magazines and other sundry periodicals. Now I run my editorial services self-proprietorship.  For several years, I've studied how to design and install solar power systems. Photovoltaics is one of the best ways that people can harness the power of the sun for clean, renewable energy.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: My cousin introduced me to Kiva and gave my family the opportunity to begin lending.  What a wonderful way to help others in the world!

lenders.name: Ed F.
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to provide an opportunity for others to become independent.  Sharing some of what I've gained, will hopefully allow others to share what they gain.
lenders.occupational_info: Occupational Therapist...I help people return to work after they've been injured.

lenders.name: M Jean
lenders.loan_because:
What a great way to help people, 
without being a big institution to do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired; I do therapy swimming, play my keyboard at a rehabilitation place, and at a home for older people.  Do a lot of volunteer work at the church; fill in at piano and organ when needed.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Galatians 5:14, The entire law is summed up in a single command: "love your neighbor as yourself."

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is my duty as a humanoid to give to the world. My declared mission is to change the lives of 25,000 people every month, and we, so far, change about 5,000 lives every month through donations of time and money. I see the opportunity with Kiva as a natural extension of that goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Traveling Sparrow
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to empower those on a global level who would not otherwise have the opportunity to support their family. I believe that KIVA
lenders.occupational_info: I own a tea company that I have started myself. I pledge to make a difference locally and globally through my business.

lenders.name: Jason Tiller
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs A opportunity and A chance to better their life, If someone takes the step to better themselves then we have to support them :)
lenders.occupational_info: sales

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: There is no point in not sharing. We are all in this thing called Life together. Besides, not sharing would mean that I had forgotten an important lesson I learned in Kindergarten.
lenders.occupational_info: I make audio and video recordings of teachings by highly ranked Tibetan Buddhist Lamas and do my best to make their profound teachings available to others at an affordable price.

lenders.loan_because: if we give the people some little help we build a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: well buy and sold diferent products in a store.

lenders.name: AKMary
lenders.loan_because: I'm a "have" in a world of too many "have-nots".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse that takes care of premature and sick babies.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to see people around the world start a business.  I would love to be an entrepreneur some day and start my own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a very large retail company in the US.  I work in the finance area where I manage the audit area.  The auditors make sure the company completes its accounting correctly and follows all laws.

lenders.name: Paige
lenders.loan_because: It's our job to help the poor.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the positive changes made throught acknowledgement of the effort of the lendees.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories about people falling in love.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate in my life and have lived among the less fortunate ,  and so I don't mind helping those that are that are trying to better their life .

lenders.name: Julie and Jerry
lenders.loan_because: Happy 50th Birthday is all about reflecting on your life and realizing the influence you have over the lives of strangers, friends and family.
